sentence.Network_en: He fell into a deep dreamless sleep.
Within the hour he had slipped once again into deep and dreamless oblivion.
sentence.Network_cn: 不出一小时，他再次陷入了无梦的沉睡。

sentence.Network_en: Finally, exhausted and exhilarated , he soon fell into a mercifully dreamless sleep.
sentence.Network_cn: 最后, 他觉得困乏了,可还是喜孜孜的, 终于很快就昏昏沉沉地睡着了.

PerfectNetExp.abs: downless 无软毛的dreamless 无梦的ductless 无管的
awakened from a dreamless sleep ,, 从无梦的睡眠中醒来,

list.abs: 有意识体验包括几种普通状态,其中最常见三种是清醒(waking)、无梦睡眠(dreamless sleep)和做梦(dreaming)。此外,还包括意识的改变状态(altered state)——可在冥想.
downy sleep 机警的睡眠dreamless sleep 睡眠时不做梦enchanted sleep 中了邪似的睡眠
if she granted his dream , she migt fall into a dreamless world . and when he had his wings , he would probably leave her .如果把梦想给了他，她将永远坠入没有梦的世界，而天使有了翅膀后，也许会离她而去。

entry.def: A dreamless sleep is very deep and peaceful, and without dreams.

example.ex: He fell into a deep dreamless sleep.

auth_sentence.content: Ever have a night of dreamless deep sleep?

auth_sentence.content: From the time I awaken until I fall into a deep, dreamless sleep, I am flooded with conscious sensations.
